thread.title: Brilliant Mini Break
thread.title_full: Brilliant Mini Break - Review of Ramada New York/Eastside, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Charlotte Berna... F
title: Brilliant Mini Break
text: Went to celebrate my 18th Birthday and it was an lovely stay! The staff were so helpful and nothing was too much bother. Even ordered us a car to take us to Newark Airport when leaving. The hotel was immaculate and the room was very clean. Could have done with a bigger bath but have no complaints about it! The breakfast had something for everyone and a big variety of pastries. The bed was the most comfortable bed I have slept in and the hotel was a 15-20 minute walk from Times Square but was in a pleasnat area.
